Key Match Events: Kawhi Leonard made his season debut against the Atlanta Hawks after missing the first 34 games of the 2024-25 season.
The Clippers bolted to a 20-point halftime lead and secured a much-needed victory after losing their last two games.
Kawhi Leonard scored his first bucket of the season by drilling a three-pointer against Hawks rookie Zaccharie Risacher.
Post-Match Reflections: Kawhi Leonard ended his night with 12 points on 4-11 shooting in just 19 minutes as the Clippers eased him back into action.
With much of the 2024-25 season still left to play, Leonard has plenty of time to make a difference and raise the ceiling for the LA squad.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The entire league was excited to see Kawhi Leonard in action again, with many top NBA pages reposting his first basket of the season to welcome him back.
